entry.title: No watches or warnings in effect, Morrisburg
entry.summary: No watches or warnings in effect.

entry.title: Tuesday night: Periods of snow. Temperature steady near minus 5.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Becoming cloudy late this evening then periods of snow. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind becoming south 20 km/h before morning. Temperature steady near minus 5. Wind chill minus 6 this evening and minus 12 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Tuesday 27 December 2022

entry.title: Wednesday: Periods of snow. High plus 1.
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending in the afternoon then cloudy. Amount 2 cm. Wind south 20 km/h becoming light early in the afternoon. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 11 in the morning. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Tuesday 27 December 2022

entry.title: Wednesday night: Clearing. Temperature steady near minus 1.
entry.summary: Clearing in the evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature steady near minus 1. Wind chill minus 6 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Tuesday 27 December 2022

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of showers. High 8. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 30 percent chance of showers. High 8. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Tuesday 27 December 2022

entry.title: Thursday night: Cloudy. Low plus 4.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Low plus 4. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Tuesday 27 December 2022

entry.title: Friday: Chance of showers. High 11. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of showers. High 11. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Tuesday 27 December 2022

entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of showers. Low plus 5. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Tuesday 27 December 2022

entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of showers. High 7. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Tuesday 27 December 2022
